item.title: popdyn livecode examples
item.description: library(tidyverse) We want to simulate a basic population dynamics process. \[X_{t+1} = X_t + r X_t \left(1 - \frac{X_t}{K} \right) = f(X_t)\] logistic <- function(x, r = 1, K = 100){ x + r * x * (1 - x / K) } We wrap our simulation up in a function, so we can pass different r values. We pass the population function as an argument. simulate <- function(r, f = logistic){ Tmax <- 300 x0 <- 10 df <- tibble(x = x0, t = 0) for(t in 1:Tmax){ x_t <- df[t,"x"][[1]] x_t1 <- f(x_t, r) df <- bind_rows(df, tibble(x = x_t1, t = t)) } ## Let's discard the early points in the time series so we get the long-term behavior.
